about.txt.content: Chad Lindemood is an IT professional specializing in cloud and systems administration, endpoint management, and network security.

certifications.txt.content: Cisco Certified Network Associate; Microsoft Azure Administrator (AZ-104); Microsoft Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900); CompTIA A+ (220-1101 + 220-1102); CompTIA Network+ (N10-008); CompTIA Security+ (SY0-601); Microsoft SC-900; Microsoft Azure Data Fundamentals (DP-900); ITIL 4.

contact.txt.content: Reach Chad at chad.lindemood@gmail.com in Canal Fulton, OH.

education.txt.content: WGU – B.S. Cloud Computing (expected Dec 2024); ACI Learning – Tech Bootcamp.

experience.txt.content: Experience spanning Tier 2 Escalations, Field Technician II, IT Service Desk roles, Stay-at-Home Father, Flooring Installer, and Signals Intelligence Analyst.

2022-11-basic-secure-network-lab.txt.content:
Built a small Packet Tracer lab with 2 routers, 2 switches, and multiple VLANs.
Configured static routing, DHCP, NAT, and ACLs to restrict traffic between VLANs.
Documented a basic network topology and simulated external internet access.

2023-01-active-directory-endpoint-manage.content:
Set up a Windows Server VM running Active Directory Domain Services.
Joined Windows 10 clients to the domain, created user accounts, and tested Group Policies.
Integrated an Azure AD trial tenant for hybrid identity experiments.

2023-05-cloud-foundations-deployment.txt.content:
Deployed a small website to Azure App Service.
Configured IAM and RBAC roles for secure access management.
Used Azure Storage to host static content and compared performance.

2023-06-firewall-intrusion-detection-lab.content:
Deployed a pfSense firewall and connected it to both Windows and Linux VMs.
Configured stateful firewall rules, VLAN segmentation, and port forwarding.
Tested security by running controlled nmap scans and logging alerts.

2025-07-advanced-cisco-enterprise-networ.content:
Built an advanced EVE-NG topology simulating a branch office network.
Configured dynamic routing with OSPF, inter-VLAN routing, and port security.
Implemented SNMP monitoring and Syslog forwarding.
Validated resiliency by simulating link failures and verifying failover.

2025-09-resume-creation-lab.txt.content:
Created an interactive lab using AI tools to build a resume-focused website.
Containerized the application with Docker and orchestrated it using Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).
Deployed the site to Azure for public access and scalability testing.
This is that website!

cloud.txt.content: Azure, Active Directory, Windows Server, VMware ESXi.

network.txt.content: SonicWall, Sophos, VPN, UniFi, Veeam backups.
